title: Touch Notifier
tooltip: A simple node.js application intended to showcase how to read digital data from a Grover Starter Kit Plus – IoT Intel® Edition Touch Sensor, start a web server and communicate wirelessly using WebSockets.
description: A simple node.js application intended to showcase how to read digital data from a Grover Starter Kit Plus – IoT Intel® Edition Touch Sensor, start a web server and communicate wirelessly using WebSockets.
